summary: An escaped lunatic, a mysterious swami, and various lovers all have designs on a famous opera singer.
cast: Chester Morris|Madge Evans|Leo Carrillo|Frank McHugh|Benita Hume|Grant Mitchell|Katharine Alexander|J. Carrol Naish|H.B. Warner|Duncan Renaldo|Leonard Ceeley|Robert McWade|Pedro de Cordoba|Charles Trowbridge|Ernie Adams|Ernie Alexander|Jack Baxley|Don Brodie|Ralph Brooks|Claudia Coleman|Billy Dooley|Sarah Edwards|Flora Finch|Rosina Galli|Mahlon Hamilton|Edward Hearn|Louis Hughes|J.P. McGowan|Greta Meyer|Edmund Mortimer|Pat O'Malley|Lee Phelps|Ellinor Vanderveer
title: Moonlight Murder
